review: It's not perfect, but it's effective and has a simple user interface. I am able to download many of the apps that I would like to watch content from, but not all of them. It would be great if there was a web browser style app that would allow me to watch shows from websites like CBS, NBC, USA, etc. That said, for the price I paid and the functionality, I am very happy. I use both of the firesticks we own everyday.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I purchased this when the Samsung "smart TV' I purchased from became almost worthless  as it  gradually required "updates" to access and display content / web streaming. When you attempt to update it fails generally indicating not enough memory.So some comments on the web seemed to indicate some of the services I wanted to stream could be accessed with the Firestick and it had enough memory to it was updatable. So far it seems pretty locked into Amazon and its partners. Frankly I think this device should allow installation of a 3rd party Browser so the customer can you it to browse any content you wish on the net.My fault I didn't really dig for more info on these two purchases before I purchased. Disappointed with Firestick and Samsung.
